Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the situation by stating that Nigeria has the highest number of cases of female genital mutilation in the world without providing concrete evidence or comparison to other countries.
Lack enough support: The claim does not provide sufficient evidence or data to support the statement that Nigeria has the highest number of cases of female genital mutilation in the world.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the number of cases of female genital mutilation in Nigeria is higher than any other country without considering the possibility of underreporting or lack of data from other regions.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not explore or mention any alternative explanations or factors that could contribute to the prevalence of female genital mutilation in Nigeria.
